# (Turbulent) Combustion

## Combustion Terms in Governing Equations {.unnumbered}

\begin{gather*}
\dfrac{\partial\rho}{\partial t} + \nabla\cdot(\rho\mathbf{u}) = \dot{m}_b''' \\
\dfrac{\partial\rho Y_\alpha}{\partial t }+ \nabla\cdot(\rho Y_\alpha\mathbf{u}) = \nabla\cdot(\rho D_\alpha\nabla Y_\alpha) + \dot{m}_\alpha''' + \dot{m}_{b,\alpha}'''
\end{gather*}
